request.description: This request retrieves a list of users from the JSONPlaceholder API.

header.value: Bearer <เอา_TOKEN_ของ_USER1_มาใส่>

body.raw:
{
  "side": "sell",
  "crypto_currency_id": "1",
  "fiat_currency_id": "1",
  "price_per_unit": "10000",
  "min_amount": "0.01",
  "max_amount": "1",
  "available_amount": "0.5",
  "payment_methods": [
    "Bank Transfer",
    "PromptPay"
  ],
  "terms": "โอนเงินภายใน 15 นาที"
}

header.value: Bearer <TOKEN_ของผู้ซื้อ_USER_ID_1>
Bearer <TOKEN_ของผู้ซื้อ>
